channel.title: Disable DragAndDrop – Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Documentation on Disable DragAndDrop

item.title: Docs: Disable this add-on temporarily
item.description:
1. Open Add-ons Manager on Thunderbird.
  2. Press Disable button.
  3. You can enable it again by pressing Enable button.

item.title: Docs: Pricing
item.description: Disable DragAndDrop is an open source software and you can use it without any purchases.

item.title: Docs: Release notes
item.description:
Disable DragAndDrop 4.3.0

  • 📅 Release date
    • Oct 25, 2019
  • ⚡️ Improvements
    • Updated home page URL.

Disable DragAndDrop 4.1.0

  • 📅 Release date
    • Jul 7, 2019
  • ⚡️ Improvements
    • Removed unused files from the package.

Disable DragAndDrop 4.0.0

  • 📅 Release date
    • Jul 6, 2019
  • ⚡️ Improvements
    • Updated targetApplication to Thunderbird 68.

Disable DragAndDrop 3.2.0

    • May 29, 2018
  • ⚡️ Improvements
    • Update targetApplication to Thunderbird 45-60.

Disable DragAndDrop 3.1.0

    • Dec 8, 2017
  • ⚡️ Improvements
    • Update targetApplication to Thunderbird 45-58.

Disable DragAndDrop 3.0.0

  • 📅 Release date
    • Apr 28, 2016
  • ⚡️ Improvements

  • ⚡️ Improvements

Disable DragAndDrop 1.0.1

Disable DragAndDrop 1.0.0
